text: Hualien Old Brewery, Building No. 3 Hualien Cultural and Creative Industries Park, Ziyou Street entrance The Hualien Cultural and Creative Industries Park () is a multi-purpose park in Hualien City, Hualien County, Taiwan. ==History== The land to construct the park was obtained on 2 April 2011. In May 2011, the operation plan was reviews and the first phase of the park was opened in September 2011. On 2 October 2011, the park was 30% opened and trial operation began. The park was fully opened in 2015. ==Architecture== The park spans over an area of 3.3 hectares and consists of 26 old factory warehouses. ==Transportation== The park is accessible within walking distance south of Hualien Station of Taiwan Railways. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Taiwan ==References== ==External links== * Category:2011 establishments in Taiwan Category:Arts centres in Taiwan Category:Buildings and structures in Hualien County Category:Hualien City
title: Hualien Cultural and Creative Industries Park
